from pyspark.sql.functions import udf, col, lit, when, coalesce, concat, sum, avg, max, min, count, countDistinct, date_format, to_date, datediff, months_between, year, month,  hour, minute, second, expr, asc, desc
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType, TimestampType, StringType, IntegerType, FloatType, DoubleType, BooleanType, StructType, StructField, ArrayType, MapType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number, rank, dense_rank, lag, lead, ntile
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.avro.functions import from_avro, to_avro
from pyspark.sql.streaming import DataStreamReader, DataStreamWriter
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql.catalog import Catalog
from pyspark.sql.column import Column
from pyspark.sql.group import GroupedData
from pyspark.sql.pandas.functions import pandas_udf

from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

%%sql

CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea AS

SELECT
		RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.PersonnelSubAreaCode, a.PersonnelSubArea) AS dim_personnel_subarea_key
	   ,a.*
FROM
(
	SELECT DISTINCT
			PSubarea AS PersonnelSubAreaCode
		   ,CASE PSubarea  WHEN 'P210' THEN 'Digital' 
						   WHEN 'P205' THEN 'Perf Com & Ops' 
						   WHEN 'P515' THEN 'EST/Central Ops'
						   WHEN 'P610' THEN 'Knowledge'
			ELSE PersonnelSubarea
			END AS PersonnelSubArea
	FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR	  
) a

%%sql

CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.dim_HR_Personnel_Area AS
SELECT
	  RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.PersonnelArea, a.PersonnelAreaCode) AS dim_personnel_area_key
	  ,a.*
FROM
(
	SELECT DISTINCT 
			PA AS PersonnelAreaCode
		   ,PersonnelArea AS PersonnelArea
	FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
) a ;

%%sql

CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.dim_HR_Gender  AS

SELECT DISTINCT 
	 CASE GenderKey WHEN 'Male' THEN 1
			   WHEN 'Female' THEN 2
	 ELSE 0
	 END dim_gender_key
	 ,
	 case GenderKey 
		when '' then 'Unknown'
		else GenderKey
	 end AS Gender

END AS SortKey_GradeGroup 
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR

%%sql

CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS  odw_curated_db.dim_HR_Work_Contract  AS

SELECT 
		 RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.WorkContractCode, WorkContract) AS dim_work_contract_key
		,a.*
FROM
(
	SELECT DISTINCT
			WorkC        AS WorkContractCode
		   ,WorkContract AS WorkContract
	FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR

	union 

	select distinct
		WorkC as WorkContractCode
		,WorkContract as WorkContract
	from odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_Leavers
) a

%%sql

CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS  odw_curated_db.dim_HR_cost_centre  AS

SELECT
	   RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.CostCentreCode) AS dim_cost_centre_key
	  ,a.*
FROM
(
	SELECT DISTINCT 
		  CASE WHEN CostCtr ='' THEN '-1' ELSE CostCtr END AS CostCentreCode
		 ,CASE WHEN CostCentre ='' THEN '-' ELSE CostCentre END AS CostCentre
	FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
) a ;

%%sql

CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.dim_HR_Grade AS
SELECT
    RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.Grade) AS dim_grade_key,
    a.*,
    CASE Grade 
        WHEN 'AA' THEN 1
        WHEN 'AO' THEN 3
        WHEN 'APP AO' THEN 2
        WHEN 'EO' THEN 4
        WHEN 'APP EO' THEN 5
        WHEN 'HEO' THEN 6
        WHEN 'SEO' THEN 7
        WHEN 'G7' THEN 8
        WHEN 'G6' THEN 9
        WHEN 'GM' THEN 10
        WHEN 'SCSPB1' THEN 11
        WHEN 'SCSPB2' THEN 12
        ELSE 99
    END AS SortKey
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        CASE COALESCE(PSgroup, 'Unknown')
            WHEN '' THEN '-1'
            WHEN 'Unknown' THEN '-1'
            WHEN 'Not Payroll Relevant' THEN '-1'
            ELSE PSgroup
        END AS Grade,
        CASE PSgroup
            WHEN 'APO' THEN 'Appeal Planning Officer'
            WHEN 'AA' THEN 'Administrative Assistant'
            WHEN 'AO' THEN 'Administrative Officer'
            WHEN 'APP AO' THEN 'Appeals Administrative Assistant'
            WHEN 'APP EO' THEN 'Appeals Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'APP HEO' THEN 'Appeals Higher Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'BAND 1' THEN 'Band 1 Inspector'
            WHEN 'BAND 2' THEN 'Band 2 Inspector'
            WHEN 'BAND 3' THEN 'Band 3 Inspector'
            WHEN 'EO' THEN 'Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'G6' THEN 'Grade 6'
            WHEN 'G7' THEN 'Grade 7'
            WHEN 'GM' THEN 'Group Manager'
            WHEN 'HEO' THEN 'Higher Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'SEO' THEN 'Senior Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'PL' THEN 'Professional Lead'
            WHEN 'SCSPB1' THEN 'Director'
            WHEN 'SCSPB2' THEN 'Chief Executive'
            ELSE 'Unknown'
        END AS GradeDescription,
        CASE
            WHEN PSgroup LIKE 'BAND%' THEN 'Inspector'
            WHEN PSgroup = 'APO' THEN 'Inspector'
            ELSE 'Other Profession'
        END AS Inspector_Support,
        CASE PSgroup
            WHEN 'AA' THEN 'AA'
            WHEN 'APO' THEN 'APO'
            WHEN 'AO' THEN 'AO'
            WHEN 'APP AO' THEN 'AO'
            WHEN 'APP EO' THEN 'EO'
            WHEN 'APP HEO' THEN 'HEO'
            WHEN 'BAND 1' THEN 'BAND 1'
            WHEN 'BAND 2' THEN 'BAND 2'
            WHEN 'BAND 3' THEN 'BAND 3'
            WHEN 'EO' THEN 'EO'
            WHEN 'G6' THEN 'G6'
            WHEN 'G7' THEN 'G7'
            WHEN 'GM' THEN 'G6'
            WHEN 'HEO' THEN 'HEO'
            WHEN 'SEO' THEN 'SEO'
            WHEN 'PL' THEN 'PL'
            WHEN 'SCSPB1' THEN 'G5+'
            WHEN 'SCSPB2' THEN 'G5+'
            ELSE 'Unknown'
        END AS GradeGroup
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
) a

%%sql


CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.vw_HR_ProtectedData
AS

WITH Dates
AS
(
SELECT DISTINCT
 Report_MonthEnd_Date AS Dt
FROM odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_protected_data
),
MinMaxDates AS
(
SELECT MIN(Dt) AS StartDate,
       MAX(Dt) AS EndDate
FROM Dates
),
dimDate
AS
(
    SELECT date,
           month_name,
           month_int,
           Month_Year_Latest AS Month_Latest,
           CASE WHEN Month_Year = Month_Year_Latest THEN SortKey*-1
           ELSE -999999
           END AS MonthYearLatest_SortKey,
           year_int AS Year,
           financial_year AS FY,
           CASE WHEN FY_Calc = 'Current' THEN 'Latest'
           ELSE 'FY-' + CAST(RIGHT(financial_year,2) AS VARCHAR(10))
           END AS FY_Latest,
           CASE WHEN FY_Calc = 'Current' THEN 2099
           ELSE financial_year
           END AS FY_latest_SortKey
    FROM
    (
        SELECT
        date,
        month_name,
        month_int,
        year_int,
        CASE WHEN MONTH(date)>3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(date) THEN YEAR(date) 
            WHEN MONTH(date)<=3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(date)+1 THEN YEAR(date)
            WHEN MONTH(date)>3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(date)-1 THEN YEAR(date)-1 
            WHEN MONTH(date)<=3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(date) THEN YEAR(date)-1
        END AS financial_year,
        CASE WHEN current_date() >= make_date(YEAR(current_date()),04,01) THEN
                    CASE WHEN MONTH(date)>3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(current_date()) THEN 'Current'
                            WHEN MONTH(date)<=3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(current_date())+1 THEN 'Current'
                            WHEN MONTH(date)>3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(current_date())-1 THEN 'Previous'
                            WHEN MONTH(date)<=3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(current_date()) THEN 'Previous'
                        ELSE NULL
                    END
              WHEN current_date() >= make_date(YEAR(current_date())-1,04,01) THEN
                     CASE WHEN MONTH(date)>3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(current_date())-1 THEN 'Current'
                            WHEN MONTH(date)<=3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(current_date()) THEN 'Current'
                            WHEN MONTH(date)>3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(current_date())-2 THEN 'Previous'
                            WHEN MONTH(date)<=3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(current_date())-1 THEN 'Previous'
                        ELSE NULL
                    END 
        END AS FY_Calc,
        date_format(date,'yyyyMM') AS SortKey,
        CONCAT(month_name,' - ',RIGHT(year_int,2)) AS Month_Year,
        CASE WHEN first_of_month = date_add(last_day(date_add((SELECT EndDate FROM MinMaxDates),1)),-1) THEN 'Latest'
            ELSE CONCAT(month_name,' - ',RIGHT(year_int,2)) 
        END AS Month_Year_Latest
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.live_dim_date
    WHERE date IN (SELECT dt FROM Dates)
    )a
),
Final
AS
(
    SELECT 
           CAST(b.date AS date) AS PC_Date,
           b.month_name AS PC_Month,
           b.month_int,
           b.Month_Latest AS PC_Month_Latest,
           b.MonthYearLatest_SortKey,
           b.Year AS PC_Year,
           b.FY AS PC_FY,
           b.FY_Latest AS PC_FY_Latest,
           b.FY_latest_SortKey,
           a.RefNo AS Ref_Number,  -- Changed from Ref_Number to RefNo
           DisabilityText,
           CASE WHEN DisabilityText IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
                WHEN DisabilityText = 'DISABLED' THEN 'Yes'
                WHEN DisabilityText = 'NOT DISABLED' THEN 'No'
                WHEN DisabilityText IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose') THEN 'Unknown'
            END AS Disabled,
           CASE DisabilityText
                WHEN 'PREFER NOT TO SAY' THEN 'Undeclared'
                WHEN 'DISABLED' THEN 'Disabled'
                WHEN 'NOT DISABLED' THEN 'Not Disabled'
                ELSE 'Not reported'
           END AS Disability_group,
           EthnicOrigin,
           CASE WHEN EthnicOrigin IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
                WHEN EthnicOrigin LIKE 'White%' THEN 'White'
                WHEN EthnicOrigin IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown') THEN 'Unknown'
           ELSE 'BME'
           END AS Ethnicity,
           CASE EthnicOrigin
                WHEN 'Asian - Bangladeshi' THEN 'Asian'
                WHEN 'Asian - Indian' THEN 'Asian'
                WHEN 'Asian - Other' THEN 'Asian'
                WHEN 'Asian - Pakistani' THEN 'Asian'
                WHEN 'Black - African' THEN 'Black'
                WHEN 'Black - Caribbean' THEN 'Black'
                WHEN 'Chinese' THEN 'Chinese'
                WHEN 'Do not wish to disclose' THEN 'Not declared'
                WHEN 'Mixed - Other' THEN 'Mixed'
                WHEN 'Mixed - White & Asian' THEN 'Mixed'
                WHEN 'Mixed - White & Black African' THEN 'Mixed'
                WHEN 'Mixed - White & Black Caribbean' THEN 'Mixed'
                WHEN 'Other' THEN 'Other ethnicity'
                WHEN 'Unknown' THEN 'Not reported'
                WHEN 'White - Any Background' THEN 'White'
                WHEN 'White - British' THEN 'White'
                WHEN 'White - Irish' THEN 'White'
                WHEN 'White - Other' THEN 'White'
                WHEN 'White - Any Other Background' THEN 'White'
                ELSE 'Not reported'
           END AS Ethnicity_group,
           ReligiousDenominationKey,
           CASE WHEN ReligiousDenominationKey IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
                WHEN ReligiousDenominationKey IN ('None','Agnostic / Atheist') OR LEFT(ReligiousDenominationKey,3) IN ('ath','agn') THEN 'Agnostic / Atheist'
                WHEN ReligiousDenominationKey = 'Christian' THEN 'Christian'
                WHEN ReligiousDenominationKey IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown') THEN 'Unknown'
           ELSE 'Other Religion'
           END AS Religion,
           CASE ReligiousDenominationKey
                WHEN 'Agnostic' THEN 'No religion'
                WHEN 'Atheist' THEN 'No religion'
                WHEN 'Buddhist' THEN 'Buddhist'
                WHEN 'Christian' THEN 'Christian'
                WHEN 'Do not wish to disclose' THEN 'Not declared'
                WHEN 'Hindu' THEN 'Hindu'
                WHEN 'Jewish' THEN 'Jewish'
                WHEN 'Muslim' THEN 'Muslim'
                WHEN 'None' THEN 'No religion'
                WHEN 'Other (please specify)' THEN 'Any other religion'
                WHEN 'Sikh' THEN 'Sikh'
                ELSE 'Not reported'
           END AS Religion_group,
           SxO,
           CASE WHEN SxO IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
                WHEN SxO ='Heterosexual' THEN 'Heterosexual'
                WHEN LEFT(SxO,3) IN ('Gay','Les','Bis') THEN 'LGBT'
                WHEN SxO IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown','Other') THEN 'Unknown'
           ELSE 'Other'
           END AS Sexual_Orientation,
           CASE SxO
                WHEN 'Bisexual' THEN 'Bisexual'
                WHEN 'Gay Man' THEN 'Lesbian / Gay'
                WHEN 'Heterosexual' THEN 'Hetero / Straight'
                WHEN 'Lesbian' THEN 'Lesbian / Gay'
                WHEN 'Not disclosed' THEN 'Undeclared'
                WHEN 'Other' THEN 'Other'
                ELSE 'Not reported'
           END AS Sexual_Orientation_group
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_protected_data a
    LEFT OUTER JOIN dimDate b
    ON a.Report_MonthEnd_Date = b.date
)
SELECT *,
      1 AS PC_Headcount,
      CASE WHEN Disabled IN ('No Record','Unknown') THEN 'No Record or Data not supplied for one or more categories.'
            WHEN Ethnicity IN ('No Record','Unknown') THEN 'No Record or Data not supplied for one or more categories.'
            WHEN Religion IN ('No Record','Unknown') THEN 'No Record or Data not supplied for one or more categories.'
            WHEN Sexual_Orientation IN ('No Record','Unknown') THEN 'No Record or Data not supplied for one or more categories.'
      ELSE 'Records Complete'
      END AS Data_Completeness 
FROM Final
